thread.section_title: Bussani Mobility Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Bussani Mobility | bussanimobility.com
thread.title: LEVINE, JOSEPH
thread.title_full: Bussani Mobility reviewed by LEVINE, JOSEPH

author: LEVINE, JOSEPH
title: LEVINE, JOSEPH
text: I have been using Bussani for accessible van purchases, modifications and repairs since the early 1980s shortly after I became disabled. I have always been happy with their work and the way they truly care about their customers. I have been particularly happy about their opening the facility in Smithtown for those who are further east on the Island.
